a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a < b:
    a, b = b, a

print(a + a - 1)

import sys

a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(max(a + b, a - 1 + b - 1, a - 1 + b, a + b - 1))

# Read input
A, B = map(int, input().split())

# Solution
print(A + B - 3)

import sys

a, b = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

print(max(a + b - 2, a + a - 1, b + b - 1))

a, b = map(int, input().split())
print(max(a, b) * 2 - 1)

# My Solution

a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(max(a + b - 1, a - 1 + b - 1, a + b, a - 1 + b))

A, B = map(int, input().split())
print(max(A+B, A*2, B*2))
